data.message: It's good to see this because it is what yall did I mention what we did for everyone already and it's great to see you finally get paid off your work and not ours because we all know and love your storytelling thur music.  I don't think it will tell everyone about the thousands of pounds yall sold across the country to achieve the star power/Cash  you have today. Your welcome. #treeshahanoshadyrealfucking pecan trees size weed plants look up die namesless.#ogkush#whoelscanclaim it so strong that it will literally knock you the Fuck out #Dbow!
